website_summaries.verdict: The classic Spikeball kit at an affordable price.
pros: Similar to the one-ball kit, but includes two additional spikeballs
We love how it comes with extra balls, which are always good to have on hand
cons: Like the one-ball kit, the legs and rim are fragile and it can be difficult to get the net tight enough to provide good bounce

customer_reviews.title: Great Game. Poor set.
customer_reviews.text: Very overpriced for what you get. Rim is flimsy and distorts when net tightened enough to make balls bounce properly. Biggest disappointment was that net tore after only a few days of playing. Now what?
customer_reviews.author: Ohmster

customer_reviews.title: This is a fun game however the net sucks
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game however the net sucks. I would not recommend spending the money on this. Especially since we are always re-stretching out the net and it just does not have enough bounce to it. We seriously have had more fun with a small exercise tramp and racquetballs and get a better result. Just my opinion maybe we are playing it wrong and don't really understand the game but I think if it had a better net or bouncing system it would be awesome and more worth the money. This is really cheap in my opinion. Sorry and Thanks
customer_reviews.author: nr

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages and levels
customer_reviews.text: First time Spikeballers and we are addicted!!! Fun for all ages and levels. We've played with 5 yrs old to 65 yrs old. Even a pregnant mom. Easy to take apart and pack up. We just ordered the ProBalls and the Glow in the dark Balls. Proballs are a little heavier and easy to control. Glow in the dark so the adults can play once the kids are in bed. GREAT GAME!!
customer_reviews.author: Falcon Cosby

customer_reviews.title: Great service, good product
customer_reviews.text: I felt this set was a bit overpriced initially, but I purchased it anyway based on the reviews (and because Spikeball is so much fun). Our first time using it a piece broke, but apparently this thing has a lifetime warranty. The Spikeball folk promptly sent me a new piece, no charge. I doubt you'll get that kind of service with the knockoff brands. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Landon

customer_reviews.title: Best outdoor game!
customer_reviews.text: Heard about this game from a teen I know (I am 37) so I purchased it for my family. It is sooooo much fun!!! Be warned however that it is an aerobic workout! I have not had so much with my kids (16,17,19) for a very long time. Very easy to learn (5 min) and the game is fast paced with lots of ball time (not waiting around like in volleyball)....highly recommend this 4 person game!!!
customer_reviews.author: tort

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages...but more fun if you're nimble
customer_reviews.text: Super fun game. When my friends and I play, sometimes kids approach out of curiosity. We teach the kids to play and they love it. I've played it 1v1 with two-hit and three-hit variations, 2v2, and 3v3. Anyone can play, but for good competition, it helps to have athletic friends. After playing it for about a year, the net is stretched out somewhat, but you can always just pull it tighter.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jang

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to buy this for my son's 11th birthday. We set it up and played an enjoyable round at this party. We felt as though the net needed tightening after a little while, and attempted to do so. No go. The net unraveled in our fingers and is completely ruined. After one use. It is a hard enough pill to swallow knowing that you are spending $60+ on a product that appears to cost $1 to manufacture... to then have it fall apart after a single use is completely ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cropper

customer_reviews.title: Great Game for the Family to play outside
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Fun to play. Rules take a little bit to get used to. But a really fun game. My older kids like this game more than the younger ones. Mostly the ones that like it the most are 14 and up. I like the bag that is include to keep everything together. Really fast to put together and take down I don't usually leave it up when not being played with. The only drawback if there is any is that only 4 people can play at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is great to bring to any family outing or picnic, and perfect if you have a large space in your backyard. You can get really creative with your plays, and there's so much room for improvement. Some things you have to keep in mind when you're setting it up though. 1. make sure that the ground you're laying it on is flat. Ideally, it should be relatively soft as well because you can be jumping up and over the net and diving to get the ball. 2. you should make sure when you're setting it up to make the net REALLY tight. That's super important to get an optimal bounce.
customer_reviews.author: Eng Ber

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fun game!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 16 year old and 11 year old boys! They love this game. It’s very durable! And they play it for hours. It’s pretty addictive in a good way, and encourages outdoor play which I love!! They have always been outdoorsy types, and play sports year round, but fortnite has taken over the world. So this mamma isn’t having that! The more outdoor things we can get into, the better!!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: We were truly disappointed in the quality of the materials used for the construction of the pieces to the game kit. We followed directions carefully only to have the cross pieces start to crack from the stress of the tubing it was designed to keep together. The net doesn't stay stretched adequately to play the games for very long. So incredibly lightweight that the target moves as you play. Honestly, this one is a rip off. . .
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Fun game; cheap plastic parts though
customer_reviews.text: Edited: I contacted SpikeBall and they are sending out a replacement part at no charge. Apparently there is a lifetime warranty. Customer service for SpikeBall is great. Purchased this for my sons birthday gift. When I bought it I expected it to be much sturdier for the cost. When we open the box to set it up I was surprised to feel the flimsy plastic rim. We set it up and with in minutes of playing the plastic rim broke. It is a fun family game however it won’t last unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Fun at the Beach
customer_reviews.text: My son came home from an afternoon with friends at the beach raving about this game, Spikeball Standard 3 Ball Kit - Game for The Backyard, Beach, Park, Indoors. He wanted to order this immediately. It arrived quickly, packaged well. The game can be played with only 2 people but is more fun with more. This set comes with 3 balls which he preferred over another set that came with only one. This is guaranteed fun for the summer.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: This game gets you moving and sweating!
customer_reviews.text: This game gets you moving and sweating! You dont have to be a volleyball player to play, but you do need to realize that your going to be running all over the place hitting the ball to your teammates and then spiking it onto the net. It's a super fun game that people of all ages can play. Setup of the net takes a few minutes and you need to tighten the net after a couple games but other than that maintenance is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Stegenga

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and Assembly is Challenging
customer_reviews.text: My son loves the game and I purchased it for him and the neighbor kids. The assembly of getting the net on was difficult. I found some videos online that assisted but be prepared to be frustrated. Getting the tautness is not explained and wasn't as bouncy as some of the videos with the product seemed to demonstrate.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Jones

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun, easy to transport - a bit flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Tons of fun, easy to transport - a bit flimsy - this is probably the most used game we have ever purchased. It has been on all sots of trips and to friends houses multiple times. Everyone wants to borrow it. As an engineer I will say the plastic was designed to be as thin as possible and still function. It could be a bit sturdier...but has not broken yet. Keep the net tight by adjusting.
customer_reviews.author: Honest John

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a HS Vice Principal and kept hearing how much the kids love this game in PE so I picked up one for home. It's a really fun game and relatively easy to set up, though complicated enough that we'll most likely leave it assembled in the backyard and only break it down if we're going camping or something. There's a choice a 3 ball version or 1 ball version-- get the 3 ball. The other two balls are just there in case you lose one over the fence, or the dog runs off with it or something, but it's a good idea to have the extras on hand.
customer_reviews.author: jkrispies

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality spike ball
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would at least last a few uses. We had a block part and my son set it up. It was used for on game and during the game the net started to unravel. Not really a good buy. I couldn’t even get one day of use. I really wanted to love this.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndy

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game for older kids(15 and 13) and/or parents. Fun to play 2 vs 2...hard to play 1 vs 1. I agree with the other reviews that it’s not super sturdy-it’s all plastic and you really have to pull the net right to get the ball to bounce. Is it worth $60? No, but we’ll keep it and play it until it breaks. We don’t plan to take it apart to bring it anywhere-just haul it as is.
customer_reviews.author: Michele K

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our family for a new backyard game during quarantine. It came recommended from a friend. We are average in terms of athleticism but this game is way too tricky for us (9 and 12 yr old kids). The ball doesn't bounce well off the net (net isn't very tight) and it's just generally frustrating. Watching videos of the "top 10 moves" is very fun and inspiring, but we haven't had much fun with the actual game. Paid way too much for something that's been relegated to a shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Z

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This is possibly the lowest quality item I have ever purchased, and it's not because it's from Amazon. This kit just doesn't hold up to ANY use (and we've owned 2, each purchased from separate places). It'd a fun game, but totally overpriced for the cheap plastic they give you. Considering looking at youtube and making a home-made one.
customer_reviews.author: Muldoonb

customer_reviews.title: Very fun game, with one problem
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun game!! I love playing it with my family. It is really cool to watch how to do it online and see professionals do it. I would definitely recommend this game to family with kids 8+. This is especially great at the beach because it can really sink into the sand and be sturdy. I want an easier way to make the net tighter without having to bend the frame. Overall this is a 10/10!!
customer_reviews.author: DR Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game to Play for all
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn't love Spikeball? I wish it was cheaper, but my son plays with this all the time. He keeps it in his trunk and brings it everywhere to play with his friends. When it's not in his trunk, it's in the backyard. We try to have 4 players all the time so we can have equal teams hitting the ball back and forth. But this game can easily played with 2 players and up, especially when you have young kids playing. So, I think I am definitely getting my money's worth.
customer_reviews.author: beanie

customer_reviews.title: Amazing game
customer_reviews.text: So few years ago got introduced to this game by some friends and it is a amazing fun time, once you get the hang of it becomes a blast, it a physical and mental game which I really enjoy. Gotta try to predict your opponents move and get their in time, takes good chemistry with your partner to as it’s a team game.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: I can never get the net to stay tight. ...
customer_reviews.text: I can never get the net to stay tight. I fix it after every point we play in a game and no progress.
customer_reviews.author: Logan Heinen

customer_reviews.title: No bounce to this ball!
customer_reviews.text: This did not work... the balls would not bounce off the net. Could not get the net to tighten.
customer_reviews.author: Rae

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest quality I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: Please, do yourself a favor and don't buy this. I paid $65 for I think the cheapest quality plastic I've ever seen in my entire life. Play football or kick rocks outside. Don't go near this garbage. I can't even return it. There's alternative brands to this, MUCH cheaper and better quality. God, I regret buying this you have no idea.
customer_reviews.author: Kia Noori

customer_reviews.title: Fun game and fairly easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: We love this game. Every year we bust it out for our trip to the beach and it gets used a lot. It's pretty easy to assemble and disassemble but I do wish they included a pump for the balls. They give you a needle, but no pump... Doesn't do you much good if you don't have a pump. Other than that, we love this game!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Z

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: We've had two sets this Christmas 2018. The first package arrived damage and the ring cracked easily during installation. The replacement came quickly and easily, but installation was impossible. The ring wouldn't fit in most if the legs. For $60, the quality of construction and quality control should be so much better. We really wanted to enjoy this game but it's been more frustration than it's worth. The ring has glued seams and I think it would be better if each segment was constructed as a single piece of thicker plastic tubing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Net assembly....bad
customer_reviews.text: I had trouble with the netting. If it was setup as identified (which was not very well identified!), the net is too loose and when I drop the ball from shoulder length, like it says to do, it does not bounce up to my knee. I tried tightening it and it was a major pain since once i tightened one side, i had to tighten all sides. I've only used it once so far, and plan to use it this weekend, so I'm hoping it's all set now, but i'm not too confident it will be.
customer_reviews.author: DMcGraw

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this game as a team building activity for ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this game as a team building activity for my HS swim team to play at an overnight camping bonding trip. 15 minutes into playing the game, one of my swimmers tripped into the game which immediately snapped and broke. That was the end of the game. The plastic isn't very strong and I hesitated in writing this review thinking we could duct tape it back together. That didn't work either.
customer_reviews.author: demaris

customer_reviews.title: Net frayed after second time playing!
customer_reviews.text: My teens love this game but the net frayed after the second time playing. Not the quality I was hoping for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made. BOTH I bought broke the same way.
customer_reviews.text: I returned one because it broke on the FIRST use. When I got a replacement, it broke as well. This is not the same spike ball set as they used to sell. This plastic is much cheaper than the sets I have used before. My friends own the same set, bought months, even years before this, and they look better. On this product, the plastic looks and feels cheaper. The rim is always crooked and never fits right on the yellow legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Much Fun
customer_reviews.text: This was Father's Day gift from my kids to my husband. We all had a lot of fun playing. We modified the rules a bit for the Littles playing. It is easy enough to play with a drink in your hand, unless you are crazy competitive. Assembly wasn't terrible, but it needs to be taken apart to be stored or taken somewhere. It is just enough of pain to assemble that we'll just be storing it as is most of the time. If it is meant to be taken apart it needs to be easier to put together. Overall worth the buy for the fun factor. A "twist and collapse" style would be great.
customer_reviews.author: Emily T

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it's the real deal...broke after 5 times playing
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE 8/29. I discovered Spikeball has a lifetime guarantee. I have a new rim on its way to me! From the beginning we had trouble getting the net situated just right on the frame. It always seemed off balance, but we still had fun playing. HOwever, on the 5th time we had it out, the frame broke when the ball bounced off of it. I have talked to others who are "Spike Ball Pros" and this is not something that has ever happened to their set. Really disappointed I spent $60 on this set.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this game! It is so much fun! The only thing is that it is made out of fairly cheap materials. However, spikeball has an unconditional lifetime warranty so my parts have already been replaced four times free of charge!:) it is a little frustrating having to wait for the part but I just tape the piece until the replacement comes!
customer_reviews.author: Bojango

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Spikeball is so much fun! The set we got was for our sons Christmas present. He and all of his friends play whenever they can. The unit itself has held up and the balls are still in decent shape. If you like having fun and like a little exercise this is a great game. Check out some YouTube videos of people playing if you aren’t sure about buying. So.much.fun!
customer_reviews.author: Burns

customer_reviews.title: Fun Game
customer_reviews.text: This is another game we purchased during quarantine. The kids love this game! They will go out and play for hours. They also incorporate it into obstacle course games. They're pretty rough with it and it seems pretty durable. They love it. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Francine M. Boecher

customer_reviews.title: Teen boys must have!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. hours of fun. this is our 3 set.. Product is kind of cheaply made for the price. Product arrived in the original packaging i.e the box that would be on the store shelf... box was completely bashed in ..thought we would have to return it... but product was in great shape. Serious perfect game to take to the beach, camp or front yard or even the street. Boys love it!
customer_reviews.author: That is what she said

customer_reviews.title: Great game, but poor construction
customer_reviews.text: My teenage boys love this game for how fun it is to play with friends. However, my son just played this once before a football landed on it and it broke. This is the second set we have bought in the last year. I love the game and am happy they get out to play, but VERY disappointed with its durability.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Kids choose Spikeball over Fortnite
customer_reviews.text: It did exactly what Inhoped it would do- get the boys (13,13,10) off the video games this summer and outside. A couple of minor things- the net is either not tight enough- ball doesn’t bounce or too tight and the rim is warped. So it is a bit of a battle getting just right. Has been worth every penny for us and would recommend to anyone looking for a fun, active game for tailgate, between games at a baseball / softball tournament or swim meet camp.
customer_reviews.author: jcwiff

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the construction of this set. Very flimsy plastic and the netting is thin as well. You have to stretch the net so hard across the frame to get any bounce that I can't see it lasting long. Even getting it as tight as we could the bounce was not enough to enjoy the game.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to set up well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up for a casual game, but extremely difficult to get just right. While I've had some good games, the hassle of trying to pull the net in all directions so that tension is balanced is extremely frustrating. One of Spikeball's slogans is "The easiest sport to play and the most difficult to master." That same slogan could be applied to the act of setting up the net.
customer_reviews.author: Joe G

customer_reviews.title: I’m returning it guys 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.text: The box it came in is beaten up pretty bad. The plastic rods are all uneven and it makes the game not sit flat on the ground. The net already has some rips and is just made cheap. This item is just a big box of disappointment. I had high hopes for this game it looks fun to play!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Bad distribution and broken parts
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is awesome, but the distribution for this product is horrible! The first time it was undeliverable and the shipper returned it because it was damaged. I was refunded in full and ordered a new one. Once we received the new one, the bars were cracked a little bit. We didn’t think it was a huge deal and we played anyways...but all it took was one hit and it completely cracked the bar beyond use. It’s been a huge hassle and even though we love this game...we might just buy it from the store because we are sick of the back and forth
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Be the life of the party
customer_reviews.text: So much fun! A bit tricky getting the netting on the first few times but we figured it out. Love that you can pack it all up and put it in the carry bag and take the fun with you. You can play indoors and out but suggest setting up in the lawn as before long you will be diving for the ball! I have seen less expensive versions but the quality is just not there with those. This is worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Sim Coffman

customer_reviews.title: This is such a fun game! We can't wait to use it everyday ...
customer_reviews.text: It has been too cold and windy to use the set we just purchased, so I will review the exact same set our friends used to introduce us to Spikeball on a recent vacation (which was why we bought a set for ourselves). This is such a fun game! We can't wait to use it everyday this summer (if possible)! We will take it camping, to the lake, to the park, almost anywhere. It is so easy to take anywhere because of its small portable size, ease of set up and ability to adjust the net if necessary. We love Spikeball and will be introducing it to all our friends this summer!
customer_reviews.author: E.conqueso

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY LOVED SPIKEBALL
customer_reviews.text: Well, I had NO idea what Spikeball was, until my daughter's high school graduation party. I was instructed to buy it, and, I dutifully did so. Watching the reaction of kids when they came through the gates to the party and saw the game set up was fun! But, watching the game played was so much fun! The kids all knew the game, a few had played, all wanted to play! We rented a very expensive velcro wall; but Spikeball got all the attention! Thanks for the innovation and I hope you make a fortune on this game that gets kids off the couch and back in the yard!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: FUN, intense game!
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this game, but it is not as easy to play as it looks. But, if you are patient and you have a good sense of humor, then go for it!!! We are using it with 3 generations in our family and we really enjoy the fun and fellowship of the game. We are not playing it competitively yet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Rose

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and defective
customer_reviews.text: Product is poorly made. It would not go together. I had to send it back. It is flimsy for what you pay for it. I will not be ordering a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: MJandkids

customer_reviews.title: Fun for All
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. We price checked several and this was a great deal with fast shipping and good quality. We have used it several times at the beach and back yard cookouts. Quick and easy to assemble and breakdown even for those inpatient people (like myself). Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tess C

customer_reviews.title: Very weak materials despite costing $60.
customer_reviews.text: The plastic rim is cheap - it cracked and broke on the first use. My friend served the ball and the rim broke when the ball hit it. The netting also frayed and we didn't even draw it that tightly. It's a fun game but the quality of materials do not reflect the $60 price! I bought from this company instead of a knock-off because I assumed the quality would be better, but I guess that was a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Iqan F.

customer_reviews.title: My son and his friends absolutely LOVE this game
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friends absolutely LOVE this game. They all play for hours. It has become the new "in" game at his high school, and all the kids are now purchasing them for playing at home this summer. It's fun to watch them all playing together. It's an ingenious idea!
customer_reviews.author: ECHEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great for the fire service too.
customer_reviews.text: I am a Battalion chief in a busy fire department that also does paramedic ambulance service. I bought this game for the crews to use to "blow off steam" between calls and also as a team building exercise. This is a great game. Everyone that plays is instantly hooked and has a blast. It is very portable and easy to set up in an instant. Highly recommended for everyone. This is also a great form of cardio exercise when you dont feel like going on the treadmill.
customer_reviews.author: Steve P. Kolodge

customer_reviews.title: Fun and a good workout!
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I love this game!! It is quick to play, but we end up playing several games because of how much fun we are having. It takes some getting used to at first, but that is true with any new game. Depending on how tricky you get with the bounces, it can be a great workout too! Very easy to learn, especially if you have knowledge about the game of volleyball. The videos are very helpful for increasing understanding.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Even if we play for 15 -30 minutes its better than sitting still
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I play one on one in the evenings in our backyard. Even if we play for 15 -30 minutes its better than sitting still. We each have demanding jobs with long hours and lots of screen time on our computers so being outdoors in our own backyard for some Spikeball has been fun. We have noticed that our hand eye coordination and balance have improved, we laugh and de-stress. We are not Spikeball competitors and still find it very enjoyable. Looking forward to using it at the beach and trying some 2 on 2.
customer_reviews.author: CT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great game the family can enjoy. We put it together right away and was excited to play. I made the net as tight as I could make it and the ball was not bouncing very high, which made it difficult to play so we gave up. I know a few people who has the same game and I reached out to see if I was doing something wrong, but it doesn’t seem like I was. I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Cottrell

customer_reviews.title: Amazon delivered in Spikeball box in front of my kid!!
customer_reviews.text: Spikeball and Amazon you failed us!! Love the game by the way so does my daughter so it was in her Christmas list!! Amazon driver delivered it in front of her in a Spikeball box!!! Who knew it was the one package not in an Amazon box!! 😤
customer_reviews.author: Sean D Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Awful Quality, broke during my first game
customer_reviews.text: I am extremly dissapointed in the quality of the official Spike Ball kit. For a product that costs $50 I expected that at least this kit could last me more than one session of normal Spike Ball play. In my very first session the frame of the net cracked in THREE separate places and as a result I have had to tape each of the cracks and attempt to continue to play. This frame uses extremly cheap, hollow, TPU tubes that easily crack and break. Although I love this game, I cannot in good faith recommend this product to anyone I know.
customer_reviews.author: Hesham Aly

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Fun.
customer_reviews.text: A friend introduced me and my wife to Spikeball and we were hooked the very first time. It's easy to set up and you don't need a huge area to play. I like how you can play on tennis courts, grass, parking lot, or anywhere with a little room to run around! We play with friends at least once a week. The rules are simple enough to learn (basically volleyball meets foursquare) and once you get them down you can hit the ground running. Setup is super easy out of the box and only takes a couple of minutes before you can start playing!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed after buying using others online reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought into buy the name brand version of this game. There’s no way it costs even 5 bucks to manufacture this. Don’t see this lasting long at all. Netting material has to be constantly re-stringed. Very disappointed for 60 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Brent R. Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Grandchildren enjoying the game. It does not seem real durable but hopefully it will last. They have played a lot so I’m thinking it is stronger than it appears.
customer_reviews.author: Fun@Leisure

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!  Super fun! Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: The Spikeball 3-ball Kit is a must have item for cookouts, family functions or any gathering of 4 people who are willing to play. The instructions are easy to follow although the product could be assembled fairly easily without a guide. The net will begin to stretch after heavy use so you may need to hook it in tighter as time goes on. The base may begin to slip if you are playing on a very smooth surface. Overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Blake Noah

customer_reviews.title: Fun but not that sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game, but the cheap plastic frame and legs of this Spikeball game leave the game seemingly unsturdy. It is portable, but doesn't seem like it will last that long. Overall, however, it is a fun game to play.
customer_reviews.author: Art Mom

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke very fast
customer_reviews.text: Love spikeball, but for some reason the plastic rim on mine snapped after a week of using it. I follow spikeball on Instagram, and those players were way more intense than what we did to crack it, so I must have just had a faulty one. Will probably replace the part, but was a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: ATGSCB30

customer_reviews.title: This game is so much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I was planning on taking a trip to Gulf Shores, AL and I was looking for some games to bring to the beach. I had heard of Spikeball through a friend so I thought I would give it a try. The product comes packaged in a nice box that seems to protect it really well. After you open it,there is a drawstring bag to keep all the pieces. The set-up instructions were easy to follow and the gameplay rules were the same. My friends and I ended up playing Spikeball for at least 3 hours a day for the 4 days we were at the beach. We couldn't get enough!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: The best part of it is that it gives you something ...
customer_reviews.text: This game is more hype than action. The best part of it is that it gives you something to do at the beach or outside if you 're with a group. The downside is that its over hyped, made pf cheap materials and in hindsight seems faddish. Its rally just a small rubber ball and a mesh net strung over flimsy plastic that you try to make fun. But, my HS kids seem to like it - at lrasy for now, so i give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Apollo

customer_reviews.title: Purchase it, play it, you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to purchase this! I bought it for my wonderful boyfriend for Christmas but I am too excited so I opened it and set it up. Very simple to set up and put together! Comes with a great bag to store it all in and the balls are easy to adjust the air. At first I put a little too much air in them but if you bounce it off the net a few times you can determine and adjust from there. Can't wait to play this more and more when the weather warms up. You will not regret his purchase. Fun game that everyone enjoys.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Wrong net
customer_reviews.text: This came with a small rectangle net instead of the rounded Spikeball net. We are sending it back for an exchange. Hopefully the replacement will be correct. I believe someone is buying there's S
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Eads

customer_reviews.title: Love this game
customer_reviews.text: So I had never heard of this game. My daughter came home from a youth trip to Fiji and wanted a set. One of the kids in the group brought a set as his carry on. It has to be good if a kid is willing to carry it from LA to Fiji. We took it camping. It was a big hit. It’s off to VT in the fall. She wants to start a spike ball club.
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Durability and extra balls.
customer_reviews.text: We have kids over quite a bit and I find they always end up playing spike ball most of the time. I was happily surprised when it came with two extra balls just in case. I may purchase a second one because it is such a hit!
customer_reviews.author: Suzi L.W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted this for the shore. Folds away nicely and easy setup. The boys played for an hour or so on the beach. Always go with the name brand when buying these types of games. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Edward E.

customer_reviews.title: Great exactly what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a birthday gift for my married daughter. She was very happy with it and it has served well for group entertainment for many occasions. (I found it hard to get the hang of, but it wasn't for me anyway)
customer_reviews.author: Carla Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game in March and 6 weeks later the frame is cracking and breaking. The return window is closed so I can't return it. This is the second spike ball game I have bought. The first one is 3 years old and my kids have loved it. My daughter was going away to college and wanted to take a game with her so I bought a new one so she could have her own. Our old game is much better quality than the new. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The worst thing ever!
customer_reviews.text: My teenage step sister begged the parents for this, only to find out it was not what she thought. After the assembly it took less than 5 mins before we threw it in the trash. It was embarrassing how unreasonable this game is and how it was a total fun killer.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Kuhlenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Really fun and Spikeball great support
customer_reviews.text: We've spent a lot of hours playing this game on the beach over the past year. Recently, someone accidentally jumped on the frame while going for a shot and broke a frame piece. Totally our fault. When I contacted Spikeball for a spare part, they sent one at no cost. Yes, they paid for the part and shipping for a part that broke at our own fault. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Irish Lass

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for athletic teens!
customer_reviews.text: My active teens and neighbors love this! Also, it is portable and can be taken anywhere, including outside family events or as a substitute for volleyball practice.
customer_reviews.author: Duffy bubba

customer_reviews.title: My son and his friends LOVEEEEEEEEE this game
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game at my son's request for his senior activities and for his graduation party. It was a MAJOR hit!! The 17-18 year olds played this over and over again. We will also be taking it to the beach for our family trip.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love that it comes in a nice bag to take along so the kids can play anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tori Payne

customer_reviews.title: Bravo!
customer_reviews.text: This volleyball family LOVES this game. For even more fun- get the float accessory for the pool. Spent day after day playing!
customer_reviews.author: Ella H

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: Such a fun and intense game. Some people really get into it, ha. Easy set up. Loads of fun. Wish I would’ve bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.author: armywife

customer_reviews.title: Might be fun if. . .
customer_reviews.text: The ball does not bounce off the net very well, makes it hard to really play. We have stretched the net as tight as we can and made certain the ball had the correct air pressure, but just doesn’t seem to work.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: Like any other game/sport there's a learning curve to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Like any other game/sport there's a learning curve to get "good" at it and get longer rallies going, but even during the learning process this game is AWESOME! After you get a hand full of games under your belt you start getting the hang of it and you get the itch for more and more. Fun game, great packaging, easy to put together and take apart for travel, comes ready to play!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: No matter how much I stretch the net, the ball wont bounce anywhere close to the height as advertised. Then when I try to stretch it the cheap plastic ring starts bending. Cheap junk.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Youth Pastor Review!
customer_reviews.text: Setting up the net was a bit of a pain to do by yourself, so you may want to have someone else help you. Other than that this is a great product and my youth group loves it! The teens wish I bought more, so if you have the money or you're just looking at getting one for yourself I'd recommend this! (From a Youth Pastor)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy B

customer_reviews.title: Game
customer_reviews.text: Received for a teenager b'day. Was easy to set up & play. It's lightweight and comes with a carrying bag for travel or storage. Will update durability after its been used for a while.
customer_reviews.author: K.W.

customer_reviews.title: great for a grad party!
customer_reviews.text: Was great for our "early" grad party! Many fathers and sons & graduates ventured into the unknown Spikeball competition realm with this! It was a great alternative to the "volleyball net" and "corn hole" set -up .... we opted for this and a new version of corn hole. Great portability & fun!
customer_reviews.author: L. Maisel

customer_reviews.title: We love this set!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE spike ball and tried to go with an off-brand version, but it broke in about 2 seconds. This set has lasted me a loooong time, and has powered through little kids trying to get in on the action. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stober

customer_reviews.title: It's great at parties
customer_reviews.text: If you haven't played Spikeball before you must try it! It's great at parties, at the park, on the beach, heck we even play it in the front yard with the neighbors. Don't get imitation sets, get the original Spikeball and you'll have fun for years.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Grenier

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic yard game. We play at home in the front yard, in grassy plots at tailgating events, and in sand on the beach. Each time we play, neighbors or random folks will stop by and ask what it is and how to play. Even my parents (both 60+) play with their friends and get great exercise in the process. Quick note: for those who have bought an older model from Spikeball, this one has the net that wraps around the bars and connects underneath as opposed to the older version which had the plastic pieces that stuck out an inch or so from the bar and connected to the net.
customer_reviews.author: Adam R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: My sons like it but just said it takes too long to take apart and put back together (they like to take it to friends’ houses).
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA ROBINSON

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game!
customer_reviews.text: So fun!! Love this game and it is super easy to put assembly and disassemble and fits into the bag that it comes with. Highly recommend this game!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incomplete “Complete Set” shipped!
customer_reviews.text: We gave a Spikeball complete set to our daughter for a birthday gift. The broken, taped up, repackaged box arrived with NO NET inside! She’s leaving for a beach vacation with friends and wanted to introduce them to the game. Spikeball’s sloppy work sure feels disrespectful to the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Wiens

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Very very fun. Brought to work picnic events, back yard parties, etc. People ALWAYS want to play or join in after watching for a bit. It is old person and young kid friendly. We had 20 year olds playing with 50 year olds at my work party. It is just super fun overall
customer_reviews.author: Luke G

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a housewarming gift for some friends. It’s prefect! Really easy to put together and if you don’t know how to play just YouTube the rules and you’re good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to be very sturdy, All Plastic and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem to be very sturdy, All Plastic and flimsy. I guess I was expecting something more solid from the "industry leader" and inventor of the game, I wanted something for big kids (47 year old dad and his friends), not for the "Little Tykes" kids. Come on SpikeBall, quit listening to the "Sharks" and build a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrena

customer_reviews.title: Was fun while it lasted!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my teenage son. They had a blast, but it broke after about 4 weeks of occasional play.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Fun game... very cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: The game is fun..... but the frame and the net are made with very cheap materials. It's really not worth $60. I don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: HomeBoy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it, we love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old loves this and so do we!! I purchased the combo set that comes with 3 balls however, ours arrived with only one ball. I contacted the seller and within 48 hours, our missing balls arrived with a bonus for our inconvenience, which we didn't have because the seller was great and handled it immediately! This game is a blast! Great quality, great seller, great buy! Fun for both kids and adults!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane B

customer_reviews.title: Family fun!
customer_reviews.text: Fun summertime game. I am always on the lookout for exciting and engaging yard games as our home is a summer gathering location. The Spikeball game is perfect. Good for all ages. It is so popular with my family, I am thinking about buying another one so we can have two games going at once.
customer_reviews.author: K B.Shaver

product_meta.title: Spikeball Standard 3 Ball Kit - Game for The Backyard, Beach, Park, Indoors
feature_bullets: FOUR PLAYER ACTION – Spikeball is a fun, active, and competitive (if you want it to be) 2 on 2 outdoor indoor sports game played on college campuses, tailgates, the lawn, yard, backyard, beach or gym with rules kind of like volleyball.
PLAY ANYWHERE - Spikeball is perfect for the backyard, the beach, or even your living room!
FOLDABLE LEGS make the product tougher. Errant dives and falls happen, these legs can take the abuse. Bonus! They make it easier to store Spikeball in your trunk, closet or garage
ADJUSTABLE NET – Play at the tournament standard or tailor the net tightness to your preference. More bounce for newer players, Less bounce for advanced
THREE BALLS - Only one is needed to play, but sometimes you don't want to go chase it down between points.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
